intro_section_title: Hello World! My name is Rayan Morais
intro_section_briefing:
Started in UX/UI design with Figma, now I build seamless web experiences using React and style them smooth with Styled Components. Fluent in English & Portuguese. Currently pursuing a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Software Engineering and finishing my on-site immersive full-stack course to deepen my development skills

intro_certification_section_obj_title2: Complete Web & Mobile Designer: UI/UX, Figma
project_section_subtitle: Some of my highlighted works on GitHub
project_section_obj_description1: This project is a personal portfolio landing page designed to showcase my skills, projects, and professional experience. The page acts as a central hub for potential employers and collaborators to learn about me and my work.
project_section_obj_description2: It is a full-stack web application that serves as a Netflix-style movie platform. It features an interface where users can browse, search for, and discover movies. The project highlights my ability to build dynamic, data-driven applications with a focus on user experience.
project_section_obj_description3: Chronos is a web-based Pomodoro Technique Timer designed to help users boost their productivity and manage their time effectively. Inspired by the popular time management technique, this application breaks down work into focused intervals, separated by short breaks.
project_section_obj_description4: Collaborating with a development team, I designed the UX/UI on Figma and we built the front-end challange for a financial management interface for Codi Academy units. We developed the design into a functional and responsive interface using React. The final product is currently deployed on Vercel, delivering a clean, intuitive user experience with a scalable architecture, ready for future API integration.

contact_section_subtitle: I'd love to hear from you. Feel free to reach out through any of these channels!
service_section_obj_description1: Crafting responsive, high-performance, and scalable websites tailored to your business needs, from concept to deployment.
service_section_obj_description2: Designing intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces that enhance user experience and drive engagement.
service_section_obj_description3: Transforming ideas into wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs using Figma, focusing on user-centric solutions.
service_section_obj_description4: Developing robust APIs and optimizing database structures to ensure seamless data flow and efficient application performance.
